content.rendered:
Directed by Paolo Barzman.

Written by Chris Masi.

Cast Beau Mirchoff (Cash McMurray 1). Tiera Skovbye (Missy McMurray 1). Tyler Jacob Moore (Gus Booker 1). Sara Garcia (Valeria Galindo 1). Jake Foy (Tuff McMurray 1). Vasilios Filippakis (Julian Katsaros). Greg Lawson (Hank Hickson). Isla Spencer (Sophie). Dylan Neal (Daniel Booker). Hugo Raymundo (Police Officer). James Gallanders (Kenny Bucknam). Stuart Bentley (Hugo). Daniel Yip (Audience Member)

Language English.

Producers Josh Adler. Elana Barry. Tom Cox. F.J. Denny. Greg Gugliotta. John Morayniss. Carolyn Newman. Jordy Randall. Virginia Rankin. Paolo Barzman. Rebecca Boss. Sherri Cooper-Landsman. Chris Masi. Series Cinematography by. Craig Wright.

Production Bell Media. Blink49 Studios. Circle of Confusion.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status On Going (2023–)
